name: HMAccessoryBrowser
desc: A network browser you can use to discover new accessories in a home.

items.name: var discoveredAccessories: [HMAccessory]
items.desc: An array of accessories discovered during a search.

items.name: func startSearchingForNewAccessories()
items.desc: Starts searching for accessories not yet associated with a home.

items.name: var delegate: HMAccessoryBrowserDelegate?
items.desc: A delegate that receives updates on the discovered accessories.

items.name: protocol HMAccessoryBrowserDelegate
items.desc: An interface used to notify an accessory browser delegate of new accessories.
